post.author: ds9490
post.body: can i use this for doom 3????

post.author: mavrik65
post.body: sorry but no because it does not export to .mb or .ma it exports/saves to a ple specific file format, however i think there's a maya ple pulgin/script thing that will enable you to export to .ma or .mb. I don't know i haven't tried looking for it.

post.author: simulation
post.body: Plus the D3 model import doesn't work with PLE.

post.author: ds9490
post.body: wat do you advise me to use

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
ds9490 wrote:
wat do you advise me to use


Depends on what you want to achieve?

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: Use blender. It's free and to the best of my knowledge there are plugins that allow importing/exporting all the necessary formats.
